The gloves of soul catching was a unique set of monk gloves once used by Autumnal Baskin, a professional meditator and a bare-knuckle champion, sometime before the late 15 century DR.
The gloves of soul catching could be worn by anyone, but they were most useful to a monk or a similar hand-to-hand combatant. The wearers unarmed attacks received a magical force damage boost additionally, once per six seconds, one successful unarmed attack restored the wearers health. However, the wearer could choose to dismiss healing magic and receive a boost of another nature instead – an advantage in aiming and landing hits, as well as a slight boost to their reactions and protections for the next six seconds. Lastly, the gloves significantly boosted constitution while the gloves were worn.
The gloves of soul catching original owner was a well-known negotiator and a mêlée fighter – Autumnal Baskin, sometime before the late 15 century DR. By the , the gloves were in the hands of Hope, a dwarven cleric, imprisoned in the so-called House of Hope in Avernus by Raphael, a cambion spawn of Mephistopheles.
